message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $2000000. I believe it's a great value and I'm confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you.  Let me know your thoughts!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1800000. I'm interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I understand your budget concerns. While $1800000 is tempting, I'm not able to go that low at this time. I'm willing to come down to $1700000. This still represents a great deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let's see if we can find common ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $1700000, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'd like to make a counteroffer of $1650000. Can you meet me in the middle?
